h2_title: Earth Wolf Miniboss Fight and Guide
content: If you see the boss angle its head and raise its arm up, be ready for a shoulder charge dash as it slides along the ground to try and tackle you. Stick to dodging away and to the side and wait until the tackle is done to get in your counters.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Earth_Wolf.md', within the main section titled 'Earth Wolf', specifically from the subsection 'Earth Wolf Miniboss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
If you see the boss angle its head and raise its arm up, be ready for a shoulder charge dash as it slides along the ground to try and tackle you. Stick to dodging away and to the side and wait until the tackle is done to get in your counters.
